# Automated importers

## rnaseq bam {-}

```{r}
require(autonomics)
file <- download_data('billing16.bam.zip')
read_bam(file, paired = TRUE, genome = 'hg38')
```

## rnaseq counts {-}

```{r}
    file <- download_data('billing16.rnacounts.txt')
    read_counts(file)
```

## proteingroups {-}

```{r}
    proteingroups <- download_data('billing19.proteingroups.txt')
    select_subgroups <- c('EM00_STD', 'EM01_STD', 'EM02_STD',
                          'EM05_STD', 'EM15_STD', 'EM30_STD', 'BM00_STD')
    read_proteingroups(proteingroups, select_subgroups = select_subgroups)
```

## phosphosites {-}

```{r}
    phosphosites <- download_data('billing19.phosphosites.txt')
    read_phosphosites(phosphosites, proteingroups, select_subgroups = select_subgroups)
```


## metabolon {-}
                             
```{r}
    file <- download_data('halama18.metabolon.xlsx')
    read_metabolon(file)
```


## somascan {-}

```{r}
    file <- download_data('atkin18.somascan.adat')                  # SOMAscan adat
    read_somascan(file)
```


```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=4, out.width="95%"}
require(autonomics, quietly = TRUE)
file <- download_data('halama18.metabolon.xlsx')
object <- read_metabolon(file) 
```
